author: bada06317
content:
root$ make testnet0
Building: p2pd
nim c -d:release --lineTrace:on -d:chronicles_log_level=DEBUG -d:const_preset=minimal -d:network_type=rlpx -d:SECONDS_PER_SLOT=30 -d:SHARD_COUNT=16 -d:SLOTS_PER_EPOCH=16 -d:DEFAULT_NETWORK=testnet0  --verbosity:0 --hints:off --warnings:off -d:usePcreHeader --passL:"-lpcre" -o:build/testnet0_node beacon_chain/beacon_node
../vendor/nim-eth/eth/p2p/rlpx.nim(776, 13) template/generic instantiation from here
../vendor/nim-eth/eth/p2p/rlpx.nim(696, 62) template/generic instantiation from here
../vendor/nim-eth/eth/p2p/rlpx.nim(668, 22) Error: attempting to call undeclared routine: 'reason='
Makefile:74: recipe for target 'testnet0' failed
make: *** [testnet0] Error 1

author: arnetheduck
content: <@604062686623432740> nah, go with the `interop` branch - `testnet0` is our legacy devp2p testnet which is no longer maintained, so you want to clone the repo, then run `make`, then run `cd multinet; ./make_genesis.sh; ./run_nimbus.sh`. we'll be rebooting `testnet0` into a slightly more long-running testnet shortly

author: jonny.derp
content: <@449019668296892420> ah ok thanks.  I was on master.  things seemed to work OK, but I will switch to Interop. thanks my dude. have fun in osaka

author: arnetheduck
content: yeah, there's a signature bug on master though which would leave you with a different genesis state tree root - you don't want to be debugging that ðŸ˜‰
